activities: Schindler Technology, Inc. collects data on behalf of its clients in the EU.  Schindler Technology, Inc. also acts as a data processor and collects information received from surveys completed through a link in Emails generated by Schindler Technology, Inc.  Schindler Technology, Inc. will not transfer Personal Data to a third party without instructions from its clients.  Schindler Technology, Inc. will process Personal Data only for the purpose(s) for which it was intended or authorized.
recoursemech: The American Arbitration Association.  Questions, comments or complaints about Schindler Technology, Inc.'s privacy policy or data collection or processing practices can be emailed to pschindler@schindlertech.com, or mailed to Paul Schindler, Schindler Technology, Inc. 2434 Seminole Court, Riverwoods, IL 60015.
